titleStmt.title: The end of the perfect man A sermon preached at the buriall of the right Honourable Sir Robert Spencer Knight Baron Spencer of Wormeleighton, Novemb. 6. 1627. in Braynton Church in Northamptonshire, by Richard Parre Bachelour in Divinity, and late fellow of Brasen-nose Colledge in Oxford, now rector of Ladbrook in Warwickshire.
titleStmt.author: Parr, Richard, 1591 or 2-1644.

titleStmt.title: The end of the perfect man A sermon preached at the buriall of the right Honourable Sir Robert Spencer Knight Baron Spencer of Wormeleighton, Novemb. 6. 1627. in Braynton Church in Northamptonshire, by Richard Parre Bachelour in Divinity, and late fellow of Brasen-nose Colledge in Oxford, now rector of Ladbrook in Warwickshire.
titleStmt.author: Parr, Richard, 1591 or 2-1644.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Turner, printer to the famous Vniversitie,

notesStmt.note: With three final leaves of verse.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
